name: RiverRestorationVictories
0:
”Alexa, open river restoration victories”
”Alexa, start river restoration victories”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: river restoration victories
des:
Listen to this interactive story with a timeless lesson. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill. 
All Rivers have been restored asserted one conservationist, it is just a matter of time! River Restoration Victories are hard won battles, a full circle in technology, when humanity evolves to a maturity in realizing the smallness and paucity of his technologies, technologies like dams, that have done much harm, encroaching on the true people of Earth, the indigenous and the blue. Listen to this interactive story about a little blue fish you name, who rediscovers the ways to his spawning grounds, a spiritual journey, without dangerous travels in waters of southern cultures and rivers that run across civilizations. By demolishing dams, we restore the flowing water, the ways of many aquatic creatures and the ways of indigenous people. In this skill we describe the Quinnipiac River in Connecticut, and the demolition of three dams and restoration of fish habitats. Maybe you should join the friends of rivers, in creating biohavens for aquatic friends.
This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
